survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered support tools, identifying strengths and areas for improvement in automated customer service interactions.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI support features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI support features have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses provided by AI support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Randomize scale direction to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses provided by AI support tools?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose AI support over human agents?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'
questions.client_notes: Include an open-text 'Other' option for qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (SINGLE_CHOICE with open-ended follow-up)

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you choose AI support over human agents?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'

questions.question_text: Describe a situation where AI support failed to meet your needs.
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture detailed pain points. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Describe a situation where AI support failed to meet your needs.
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q3 answer is 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied'

questions.question_text: Which industries do you believe benefit most from AI customer support? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes with a selection limit. Consider adding 'Other' if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selections (MULTI_CHOICE with validation)

script.question_text: Which industries do you believe benefit most from AI customer support? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered customer support to others?
questions.client_notes: Use an 11-point NPS scale. Display as a slider on mobile devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button or slider (SINGLE_CHOICE)

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered customer support to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make AI support more valuable to you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovation ideas. Suggest keeping responses brief.

script.question_text: What improvements would make AI support more valuable to you?

questions.question_text: Do you trust AI support tools to handle sensitive personal information?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge trust levels. Important for privacy-sensitive sectors.

script.question_text: Do you trust AI support tools to handle sensitive personal information?

questions.question_text: What type of issues do you typically resolve using AI support?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'

script.question_text: What type of issues do you typically resolve using AI support?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'
